name: Creativerse
description: Creativerse is a Minecraft inspired game built around an MMO experience.
content:
game:
  appid: 280790
installer:
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2013
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing Direct3D 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Core Fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
